ProductInfo.Features:
This innovative new inspection tool allows for easy visual inspections in hard-to-reach areas
Its comfortable pistol grip design and forward facing controls make it easy to detect and diagnose the unreachable
Wireless Inspection Camera with LCD Monitor be your eyes and hands while you look inside walls without tearing them apart
Mini water-proof camera with (2 pcs )1 m (3-Inch) flexible extended tube
Waterproof Level: IP67 with Underwater, Night Vision Range
ProductInfo.Name: 2.5 TFT-LCD Color removeable Wireless Waterproof Snake Plumbing Sewer Inspection Camera come with Easy Carrying Storage Box (extend to 9ft detection range) "
